text: [Music]
once upon a time in a little village
there lived two brothers James and

and extremely unkind to everyone move
out of my way
ah how rude well you were in the way I'm

Jordan James is really too rude yep

to no ends dad I got the fruits he
wanted

oh here dad listen James whatever you
plant you eat just remember that what

don't worry dad I'm sure somewhere deep

this land and wealth equally
amongst yourselves what diet don't say

important after a few days he passed

since I am the eldest I get everything
it's not enough to share with you so
leave oh where will I go ooh but James

broken-down house on it he went to the

but one day Jordan lost his job and soon

Jordan tried searching for jobs but was

it's been two weeks and we have very

baby I'm hungry oh here you go son
ate it all up yes I think I'll do just

hey why dear James is just a poor beggar
now did you come here thinking I'd help

go away he never returned he slammed the
door on port Jordans face James was
extremely happy in his riches and life
he hadn't changed and was still a mean
person Jordan walked back slowly and
sadly as he walked back he spotted a
snake about to attack a little baby bird
the little bird fell into the bushes
but when Jordan went to see it its leg

so he took the baby bird home applied

what a sweet

then the earth started to vibrate as

[Music]
what are you James
well let's take them in shall we
he took them in and everyone waited well

Oh oh my goodness there's so much gold I

Jordan sold the golden gems and soon he
